long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BidSense AI Assistant: Your AI-powered companion for government contract analysis

Streamline your government contracting process with BidSense AI Assistant. This powerful Chrome extension leverages artificial intelligence to provide instant, in-depth analysis of contract opportunities on SAM.gov.

Key Features:
• Instant Analysis: Get AI-powered insights on contract opportunities with just one click.
• Smart Summaries: Receive concise, easy-to-understand summaries of complex contract details.
• Time-Saving: Quickly identify relevant opportunities without manually sifting through lengthy documents.
• User-Friendly Interface: Seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience on SAM.gov.
• Secure: Your data and API keys are stored locally and securely on your device.

How it works:
1. Install the extension and configure your OpenAI API key.
2. Browse to a contract opportunity on SAM.gov.
3. Click the BidSense AI Assistant icon to analyze the current page.
4. Review the AI-generated summary and insights directly in your browser.
